        name - the value(s) to be put into the mutual group
        Throws:
        MutualExclusionException - when the value is existing in other group.
        UnknownArgumentException - when there is no such group find.

      • parse

        public void parse(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> input)
        Parses the string passed in through the Command Line.
        Parameters:
        input - the string Arraylist to be parsed
        Throws:
        MissingArgumentException - if the amount of values parsed does not match the number of required arguments
        InvalidArgumentException - if the amount of values parsed exceeds the number of required arguments
        UnknownArgumentException - if the data type of a value does not match the data type of the argument
